body.name: INOVADAY 100% Blackout Curtains for Bedroom 84 Inch Length 2 Panels Set, Linen Blackout Curtains 84 Inches Long, Back Tab/Rod Pocket Black Out Room Darkening Curtains for Living Room- Cream, W50 X L84
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Packing Details】1 Package of INOVADAY linen blackout curtains contain 2 panels. Each panel measured width 50 x 84 length (Inches). Solid color, casual style and linen texture room darkening curtains will complement the decor of any room, which is perfect for modern rustic farmhouse, country chic, rustic or classic traditional room style.

【100% Blackout Effect】100% Blackout curtains. Our blackout linen curtains are crafted from soft and draped textured linen look fabric, add 100% blackout lining, which makes the drapes soft but thick enough to completely keep out the sunlight, offer you a real dark room. Perfect for toddlers sleep longer and daytime naps; Nightshift workers will have a good sleep even at daylight; Light sensitive sleepers can also wake up naturally and feel well rested.

【3-in-1 Hanging Style】Differ from the grommet hanging will let sunlight emit form the top, back tab and rod pocket hanging will full block sunlight. INOVADAY black out curtains offer 3 hanging options for you: (1) Using the back tabs to create an elegant pleated effect; (2) From the 3" rod pocket for a classic look; (3) Using clip rings for easy, slide open/closed (clip rings are not included). This 3-in-1 construction makes the maximum coverage of windows while offering a more private space.

【Thermal Insulation】With the grey liner backing makes curtains block out the heat and cool air while sunlight blocking, also have the function of dampen noise from outside. Provide a more comfortable environment for your room.

【Easy Care】Use of heavy duty smooth fabric for effortless hanging. Machine washable for easy care and maintenance, do not bleach, Warm iron or steam iron and tumble dry at low temperatures if necessary.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Machine washable in cold water, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, no color fading, wrinkle resistant, warm ironing or steam clean if necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the weight and quality of these curtains. Really great price even compared to Home Goods. I got these in beige and they're definitely a light neutral beige. I like the color and don't think they pull any undertones on my neutral wall color. Highly recommend if you are looking for stylish and blackout curtains especially in the longer lengths.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are pretty thick it helps block the cold and makes the room dark. Good material!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, sturdy, and reliably a blackout curtain
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are not only beautiful and classy, but they are excellent at blacking out the light. Since I’ve invested in these curtains, I feel like my sleep has improved dramatically and I wake up refreshed. I found that even though I didn’t have lot of white and didn’t have blackout curtains, the moonlight and starlight created a lot of disruption in my need for total darkness in my sleep. So, if you were someone who needs total darkness and wants to invest in an aesthetically pleasing curtain, I don’t think you could go wrong with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy them! Absolutely beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough about how beautiful these curtains are. They have added another level of coziness to my home. They are extremely affordable, look high end and the fabric is top notch. They do require steaming. I have the Oatmeal, blackout. Just buy them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't tell them
reviews.reviewText: These are so nice and heavy... I can't believe it when I get them just how heavy they are... well made... lining inside... tab or in-between fabric lining. These are worth it. Won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great curtains but must be ironed!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the INOVADAY 100% Blackout Curtains for my bedroom and let me tell you, these curtains are truly a game-changer. As someone who loves to sleep in a completely dark room, these curtains have been a dream come true. The thermal insulation keeps the room at the perfect temperature, making it perfect for those hot summer nights. And the fact that they come in a set of two panels is an added bonus, making it easier to cover my large bedroom windows.One thing I will say is that I made the mistake of ordering the bright white color. While they look stunning and add a touch of elegance to my room, they do show wrinkles quite easily. However, a quick ironing session took care of that issue and they now look perfect. In hindsight, I would recommend going for a darker color to avoid this minor inconvenience.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase and would highly recommend the INOVADAY blackout curtains to anyone looking for a good night's sleep. They are thick, durable, and truly live up to their promise of complete darkness. Trust me, your sleep schedule will thank you for investing in these curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Blackout Curtains
reviews.reviewText: These are wonderful curtains. They are thick and have a linen texture. We live in the city and these are wonderful blackout curtains. They block so much light and keep the room very dark even on a bright sunny day. Would buy these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality. Stopped Draft.
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are awesome! The quality is excellent. They are very thick, the texture is nice. They are absolutely blackout. I like the different hanging options. I ironed them on a light setting, and the packing wrinkles came out well. We also have drafty windows, and these made a HUGE difference. We are replacing the rest of our curtains with these!
Beautiful quality drapes. Fully block out the sunlight for dark bedroom. Highly suggest.
